game.title: The Lost Temple of the Ancients
game.objective: Explore the ancient temple and retrieve the artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle, filled with ancient artifacts. Your mission is to explore the temple, navigate its deadly traps, and retrieve an artifact rumored to grant immense power.
game.reward: Gold: 1000, Experience Points: 500, Artifact: 'Eye of the Ancients'

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle and locate the temple.
task.description: Be cautious, as the path to the temple is said to be treacherous, filled with wild beasts and rival treasure hunters.

task.objective: Explore the temple and find the inner sanctum.
task.description: Beware of deadly traps and puzzles that guard the artifact.
task.location: Temple Inner Sanctum: 3rd Chamber, Left Door

task.objective: Retailve the artifact 'Eye of the Ancients'.
task.description: Solve the final puzzle to unlock the chamber holding the artifact.
task.location: Temple Inner Sanctum: 5th Chamber, Central Pedestal
